    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Litmus test</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lackmustest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essai de tournesol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teste do litmus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prova del tornasole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Litmus δοκιμή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prueba del tornasol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how litmus is used as an indicator for acid, neutral, or alkali substances by observing its colour upon reaction with the substances.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkalis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">litmus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutral</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Lackmus während eine 
Anzeige für die saure, Null- oder Alkalisubstanzen benutzt wird, 
indem man seine Farbe nach Reaktion mit den Substanzen beobachtet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment le tournesol 
est utilisé pendant qu'un indicateur pour les substances acides, 
neutres, ou d'alcali en observant sa couleur sur la réaction aux 
substances.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como o litmus é usado 
enquanto um indicador para substâncias ácidas, neutras, ou do 
alcalóide observando sua cor em cima da reação com as substâncias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come il tornasole è 
usato mentre un indicatore per le sostanze acide, neutre, o 
dell'alcali osservando il relativo colore su reazione con le sostanze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς litmus 
χρησιμοποιείται ως δείκτης για τις όξινες, ουδέτερες, ή 
αλκαλικές ουσίες με την παρατήρηση του χρώματός του επάνω στην 
αντίδραση με τις ουσίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo el tornasol es 
utilizado mientras que un indicador para las sustancias ácidas, 
neutrales, o del álcali observando su color sobre la reacción con 
las sustancias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säuren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alkalien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
